_comment: Created by EFisher on 03/12/2015 13:06:39 using v2.7
title: What do services users say about how satisfied they are with services?
analysis_commentary:
Here we look at the proportion of users who are either extremely or very satisfied with their care and support, or those who say the way staff help them is really good in response to the easy-read version of the question.

The changes to the methodology create a break in the time series in 2014-2015 and comparison to previous years is not possible.

In 2014-15 we find that 64.7% of respondents said they were satisfied with their care and support, leaving over 35% of users not fully satisfied.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, Personal Adult Social Care Survey
